title: UAE’s Etihad Rail operator Keolis appoints Yoen Dupuis as CEO ahead of passenger service launch
summary_full: Keolis has appointed Yoen Dupuis as the new CEO for its Middle East and East Asia regions, based in the UAE. Dupuis will oversee strategic planning and operations for advanced transit networks, including the Dubai Metro and Tram, while driving sustainability and integrating smart technologies for a smoother commuter experience.
